info.title: Financial Datasets API
info.description: Stock market API with real-time and historical financial data for 30,000+ tickers over 30+ years. Financial statements, equity prices, insider transactions, SEC filings, and more.

tags.name: Financial Statements
tags.description: Access to income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements

tags.name: Company Information
tags.description: Company facts, filings and insider transactions

post.description: Search for financial data across income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements using filters.
Search for specific financial metrics across income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements.

get.description: Get insider trades like purchases, sales, and holdings for a ticker.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol of the company.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of transactions to return (default: 10).

get.description: Get company facts for a ticker.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol.

get.description: Get SEC filings for a company.

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The Central Index Key (CIK) of the company.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol.

get.description: Get detailed, segmented revenue data for a ticker.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The date or time period to which the reported revenue data relates in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of revenue statements to return.

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The Central Index Key (CIK) of the company.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The time period of the income statements.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of income statements to return.

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The Central Index Key (CIK) of the company.

parameters.description: The ticker symbol.

parameters.name: period

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of balance sheets to return

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The Central Index Key (CIK) of the company.

parameters.name: period

get.description: Get the real-time price snapshot for a ticker.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol.

get.description: Get all financial statements for a ticker.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The time period of the financial statements.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of financial statements to return.

parameters.name: cik
parameters.description: The Central Index Key (CIK) of the company.

get.description: Get ranged price data for a ticker to power stock charts and analyze price movements.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The time interval for the price data.

parameters.name: interval_multiplier
parameters.description: The multiplier for the interval.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date for the price data (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date for the price data (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of price records to return (default: 5000, max: 5000).

get.description: Get real-time options chain data for actively traded equities.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol of the company.

parameters.name: strike_price
parameters.description: The strike price of the options contract.

parameters.name: option_type
parameters.description: The type of option contract (call or put).

parameters.name: expiration_date
parameters.description: The expiration date of the options contract (YYYY-MM-DD).

get.description: Get financial metrics for a ticker, including valuation, profitability, efficiency, liquidity, leverage, growth, and per share metrics.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol of the company.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The time period for the financial data.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

200.description: The historical financial metrics and ratios for a ticker

get.description: Get a real-time snapshot of key financial metrics and ratios for a ticker, including valuation, profitability, efficiency, liquidity, leverage, growth, and per share metrics.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol of the company.

200.description: The current financial metrics snapshot for a ticker

period.description: The time period for the financial data.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

order_by.description: The field to order the results by.  Use -field to order in descending order.

currency.description: The currency of the financial data.

field.description: The criteria to filter on.  For financial metric fields, use 'gt', 'lt', 'gte', 'lte', 'eq' operators.  For 'ticker' and 'cik' fields, use the 'in' operator to filter against multiple values.

operator.description: The comparison operator. The 'in' operator can only be used with a field value of 'ticker' or 'cik' and lets you filter against multiple values.

oneOf.description: The value to compare against for single-value operators (gt, lt, gte, lte, eq)
Array of ticker or cik values to compare against when using the 'in' operator

filters.description: An array of filter objects to apply to the search.

items.description: The financial metric to search for.

line_items.description: An array of line items to apply to the search.

tickers.description: An array of tickers to apply to the search.

period.description: The time period for the financial data.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

ticker.description: The ticker symbol of the company.

report_period.description: The reporting period of the financial data.

period.description: The time period of the financial data.

currency.description: The currency of the financial data.

additionalProperties.description: Additional financial metrics based on the search criteria.

ticker.description: The ticker symbol of the company.

issuer.description: The name of the issuing company.

is_board_director.description: Whether the insider is a board director.

transaction_shares.description: The number of shares involved in the transaction.

transaction_price_per_share.description: The price per share in the transaction.

transaction_value.description: The total value of the transaction.

shares_owned_before_transaction.description: The number of shares owned before the transaction.

shares_owned_after_transaction.description: The number of shares owned after the transaction.

security_title.description: The title of the security involved in the transaction.

filing_date.description: The date the transaction was filed.

report_period.description: The reporting period of the revenue.

period.description: The time period of the revenue.

items.description: An array of revenue segments from SEC filings (10-Ks and 10-Qs) in XBRL format

axis.description: Represents the dimensional context of the reported data, often used by companies to categorize or segment information according to SEC reporting requirements.

key.description: A unique identifier for the financial metric, typically using the XBRL taxonomy. It specifies the particular financial concept being reported.

value.description: The numerical amount reported for the specified financial metric, expressed in the company's reporting currency; default is USD.

segment.description: The label for the revenue segment.

start_period.description: The start period of the revenue segment.  Only provided for quarterly data.

end_period.description: The end period of the revenue segment.  Only provided for quarterly data.

calendar_date.description: The date of the income statement.

report_period.description: The reporting period of the income statement.

period.description: The time period of the income statement.

currency.description: The currency in which the financial data is reported.

revenue.description: The total revenue of the company.

cost_of_revenue.description: The cost of revenue of the company.

gross_profit.description: The gross profit of the company.

operating_expense.description: The operating expenses of the company.

selling_general_and_administrative_expen.description: The selling, general, and administrative expenses of the company.

research_and_development.description: The research and development expenses of the company.

operating_income.description: The operating income of the company.

interest_expense.description: The interest expenses of the company.

ebit.description: The earnings before interest and taxes of the company.

income_tax_expense.description: The income tax expenses of the company.

net_income_discontinued_operations.description: The net income from discontinued operations of the company.

net_income_non_controlling_interests.description: The net income from non-controlling interests of the company.

net_income.description: The net income of the company.

net_income_common_stock.description: The net income available to common stockholders of the company.

preferred_dividends_impact.description: The impact of preferred dividends on the net income of the company.

consolidated_income.description: The consolidated income of the company.

earnings_per_share.description: The earnings per share of the company.

earnings_per_share_diluted.description: The diluted earnings per share of the company.

dividends_per_common_share.description: The dividends per common share of the company.

weighted_average_shares.description: The weighted average shares of the company.

weighted_average_shares_diluted.description: The diluted weighted average shares of the company.

calendar_date.description: The date of the balance sheet.

report_period.description: The reporting period of the balance sheet.

period.description: The time period of the balance sheet.

currency.description: The currency in which the financial data is reported.

total_assets.description: The total assets of the company.

current_assets.description: The current assets of the company.

cash_and_equivalents.description: The cash and equivalents of the company.

current_investments.description: The current investments of the company.

trade_and_non_trade_receivables.description: The trade and non-trade receivables of the company.

non_current_assets.description: The non-current assets of the company.

property_plant_and_equipment.description: The property, plant, and equipment of the company.

goodwill_and_intangible_assets.description: The goodwill and intangible assets of the company.

non_current_investments.description: The non-current investments of the company.

outstanding_shares.description: The outstanding shares of the company.

tax_assets.description: The tax assets of the company.

total_liabilities.description: The total liabilities of the company.

current_liabilities.description: The current liabilities of the company.

current_debt.description: The current debt of the company.

trade_and_non_trade_payables.description: The trade and non-trade payables of the company.

deferred_revenue.description: The deferred revenue of the company.

deposit_liabilities.description: The deposit liabilities of the company.

non_current_liabilities.description: The non-current liabilities of the company.

non_current_debt.description: The non-current debt of the company.

tax_liabilities.description: The tax liabilities of the company.

shareholders_equity.description: The shareholders' equity of the company.

retained_earnings.description: The retained earnings of the company.

accumulated_other_comprehensive_income.description: The accumulated other comprehensive income of the company.

total_debt.description: The total debt of the company.

calendar_date.description: The date of the cash flow statement.

report_period.description: The reporting period of the cash flow statement.

period.description: The time period of the cash flow statement.

currency.description: The currency in which the financial data is reported.

net_cash_flow_from_operations.description: The net cash flow from operations of the company.

depreciation_and_amortization.description: The depreciation and amortization of the company.

share_based_compensation.description: The share-based compensation of the company.

net_cash_flow_from_investing.description: The net cash flow from investing of the company.

capital_expenditure.description: The capital expenditure of the company.

business_acquisitions_and_disposals.description: The business acquisitions and disposals of the company.

investment_acquisitions_and_disposals.description: The investment acquisitions and disposals of the company.

net_cash_flow_from_financing.description: The net cash flow from financing of the company.

issuance_or_repayment_of_debt_securities.description: The issuance or repayment of debt securities of the company.

issuance_or_purchase_of_equity_shares.description: The issuance or purchase of equity shares of the company.

dividends_and_other_cash_distributions.description: The dividends and other cash distributions of the company.

change_in_cash_and_equivalents.description: The change in cash and equivalents of the company.

effect_of_exchange_rate_changes.description: The effect of exchange rate changes of the company.

ticker.description: The ticker symbol of the company.

cik.description: The Central Index Key (CIK) of the company.

market_cap.description: The market capitalization of the company.

weighted_average_shares.description: The weighted average shares of the company.

number_of_employees.description: The number of employees at the company.

sic_code.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code of the company.

sic_description.description: The description of the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code.

website_url.description: The URL of the company's website.

listing_date.description: The date the company was listed on the stock exchange.

is_active.description: Whether the company is currently active.

cik.description: The Central Index Key (CIK) of the company.

accession_number.description: The accession number of the filing.

filing_type.description: The type of the SEC filing (e.g., 10-Q, 8-K).

url.description: The URL of the SEC filing.

price.description: The current price of the stock.

day_change.description: The price change since the previous trading day's close.

day_change_percent.description: The percentage price change since the previous trading day's close.

time.description: The timestamp of the price snapshot in human-readable format in UTC.

open.description: The open price of the ticker in the given time period.

close.description: The close price of the ticker in the given time period.

high.description: The high price of the ticker in the given time period.

low.description: The low price of the ticker in the given time period.

volume.description: The volume of the ticker in the given time period.

time.description: The human-readable time format of the price in UTC.

strike_price.description: The strike price of the option contract.

expiration_date.description: The expiration date of the option contract.

shares_per_contract.description: The number of shares per contract.

volume.description: The trading volume of the option contract.

bid_price.description: The highest price a buyer is willing to pay.

bid_size.description: The quantity of contracts at the bid price.

ask_price.description: The lowest price a seller is willing to accept.

ask_size.description: The quantity of contracts at the ask price.

last_trade_price.description: The price of the last executed trade.

last_trade_size.description: The size of the last executed trade.

last_trade_time.description: The time of the last trade in human-readable format in UTC.

ticker.description: The ticker symbol of the company.

market_cap.description: The market capitalization of the company.

enterprise_value.description: The total value of the company (market cap + debt - cash).

gross_margin.description: Gross profit as a percentage of revenue.

operating_margin.description: Operating income as a percentage of revenue.

net_margin.description: Net income as a percentage of revenue.

return_on_equity.description: Net income as a percentage of shareholders' equity.

return_on_assets.description: Net income as a percentage of total assets.

return_on_invested_capital.description: Net operating profit after taxes as a percentage of invested capital.

asset_turnover.description: Revenue divided by average total assets.

inventory_turnover.description: Cost of goods sold divided by average inventory.

current_ratio.description: Current assets divided by current liabilities.

quick_ratio.description: Quick assets divided by current liabilities.

cash_ratio.description: Cash and cash equivalents divided by current liabilities.

debt_to_equity.description: Total debt divided by shareholders' equity.

debt_to_assets.description: Total debt divided by total assets.

payout_ratio.description: Dividends paid as a percentage of net income.

earnings_per_share.description: Net income divided by weighted average shares outstanding.

book_value_per_share.description: Shareholders' equity divided by shares outstanding.

free_cash_flow_per_share.description: Free cash flow divided by shares outstanding.

NotFoundError.description: The specified resource was not found

PaymentRequiredError.description: The request requires a paid subscription

example.message: This endpoint requires a paid subscription. Please upgrade your plan.
